page.title: 15A Riding School, Erbistock
page.content: The Mill House Riding School has been run by a man and his wife for 22 years.There are 10 horses used for teaching riding.There is no school rink and the nearby lanes and bridle paths are used for hacking. Inexperienced riders are taken on a lead rein. The owners have no need to advertise as their clients come on personal recommendation. Now that the owners are in their seventies they run the school as a hobby rather than as a business, as it once was. The cost of an hour's lesson is set at a very competitive rate of Â£2.50 per hour.
